summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 23.54.015, 23.69.022, 23.69.024, 23.69.026, 23.69.028, 23.69.034, 23.69.035, and 23.76.036 of the Seattle Municipal Code; adding Section 23.69.023 to the Seattle Municipal code; to revise the regulations governing acquisition, merger, or consolidation of major institutions; and adding Section 23.69.021 to the Seattle Municipal Code to add back language inadvertently repealed governing signs in Major Institution Overlay Districts.
